3.eng-name: The Book of the Adhan and the Sunnah Regarding It

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Ibn 'Abbas said:"The Messenger of Allah said: 'Let the best of you give the call to prayer (Adhan), and let those who are most versed in the Qur'an lead you in prayer

chapter.eng-name: The Virtue Of The Adhan And The Reward Of The Mu'adh-dhin
